French: La Révolution française a eu un impact durable sur l'histoire de l'Europe.
English: The French Revolution had a lasting impact on European history.

French: La culture celtique a laissé des traces dans de multiples traditions populaires en Europe.
English: Celtic culture has left its mark in multiple traditional practices throughout Europe.

French: Le roman de la Révolution française est resté célèbre grâce à des auteurs tels que Victor Hugo et Alexandre Dumas.
English: The story of the French Revolution has remained famous thanks to authors such as Victor Hugo and Alexandre Dumas.

French: La Renaissance a marqué un tournant décisif dans l'histoire de la littérature française.
English: The Renaissance marked a decisive turning point in the history of French literature.

French: Les croisades ont eu un impact considérable sur les relations entre les cultures et les religions en Europe.
English: The Crusades had a significant impact on the relationships between cultures and religions in Europe.
